In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of this woman and this man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Sokhorn's Group

texts.en: Sokhorn’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sokhorn works as a farmer and he also does extra work as a factory laborer and officer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Jinette

texts.fr: Ginette, 51 ans, est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle a démarré une petite activité de vente de produits utilisés dans la confection de vêtements tels que fils, aiguilles, boutons, etc. Elle exerce cette activité depuis deux ans. Une activité qui se révèle très rentable car la zone regorge d'ateliers de couture et de couturiers de rue. Voulant assurer la croissance de son activité pour augmenter ses revenus et améliorer ses conditions de vie, elle sollicite un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de marchandises.
texts.en: Ginette, aged 51, is a married mother of two. She began a small-scale business selling goods used in making clothing, such as thread, needles, buttons, etc. She has been in this business for two years, and it has turned out to be very profitable, since the area is bursting with fashion shops and street tailors. Wanting to ensure that her business grows, so as to increase her income and improve her living conditions, Ginette is requesting a micro-loan to augment her stock of merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of fabrics and some thread.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is 29 years of age, living with her husband in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is well trained in cloth stitching. She provides services in stitching to people at her own house.

She needs to purchase a sewing machine and a variety of stitching material for the shop, including thread, needles, clothing, etc. This is very important for her to continue her work efficiently and professionally. However, due to the lack of money she finds it difficult. So Bushra is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan.

BRAC Pakistan issued her loan as per her request. Bushra is very thankful to Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to invest in her tailoring business.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a furniture-making business in the Philippines.

Lucia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials like wood, nails, paint, etc. for her business.

Lucia has been in this business for 13 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more materials like wood, nails, and paint for her business.

loans.name: Iliomaine

texts.fr: Lliomaine, âgée de 52 ans, vit en union libre et a 7 enfants qui sont tous scolarisés. Cela fait 3 ans depuis qu’elle vend des produits cosmétiques sur le trottoir presque à l’entrée de sa maison. Avec cette activité qu’elle exerce, elle arrive à contribuer aux lourdes dépenses de sa famille. Commerçante connue de la zone, elle est souvent fréquentée pour l’achat de ses produits. Illiomaine veut agrandir davantage son commerce et pouvoir épargner de l’argent pour les études de ses enfants. Craignant que son stock soit insuffisant, elle a demandé un microcrédit pour augmenter ses marchandises.
texts.en: Lliomaine aged 52, lives in a common-law marriage and has seven children, all provided with schooling. For three years, she has been selling cosmetic products on the sidewalk near her home’s front door. Through this business that she runs, she manages to help cover heavy family expenses. A known merchant in the area, she is busy with customers buying her products. Lliomaine wants to expand her business further and to save money for her children’s education. Fearing that her inventory may be lacking, she is asking for a micro-loan to augment it.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of toothpastes and bath soaps

loans.name: Marie Jacqueline

texts.fr: Jacqueline, 46 ans, vit en union libre et a 3 enfants qui sont scolarisés. Pour prendre soin de son foyer, elle a créé une activité commerciale au marché son quartier où elle vend des produits alimentaires. Elle travaille sans relâche pour assurer la pérennité de son activité qu’elle gère avec efficacité. Voulant augmenter son stock, elle a entrepris des démarches auprès de Palmis Mikwofinans Sosyal afin de trouver un prêt pour acheter des produits tels que : riz, sucre, farine et autres pour pouvoir répondre à la demande de ses clients.
texts.en: Jacqueline, aged 46, lives in a common-law marriage and has three children in school. To take care of her household, she established a business at the market in her district where she sells grocery items. She works tirelessly to ensure sustainability for her business, which she manages effectively. Wanting to increase her inventory, she has approached Palmis Mikwofinans Sosyal in order to find a loan to purchase goods, such as:  rice, sugar, flour, and more, so as to be able to respond to customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items

loans.name: Sopheap's Group

texts.en:
Sopheap’s Group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sopheap makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and the man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Chantheoun's Group

texts.en: Chantheoun’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Chantheoun makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as a factory laborer to support his family. In his village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help this woman and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Hern's Group

texts.en: Hern’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Hern works as a factory laborer and seller to support her family. In her village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help this woman and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Sokhern's Group

texts.en: Sokhern’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sokhern does work as a factory laborer and seller to support her family. In her village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Marie Claudette

texts.fr: Claudette a 51 ans. Afin de pouvoir scolariser ses enfants, elle a créé son activité. Elle vend des vêtements au marché de son quartier depuis plus de 20 ans. C’est sa principale source de revenu. Elle demande un microcrédit pour diversifier les produits qu’elle vend et s’approvisionner régulièrement pour éviter les ruptures de stock. A l’avenir, elle espère économiser pour subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants.
texts.en: Claudette is 51 years old. To provide an education for her children, she established a business. She has been selling clothing at the market in her district for over twenty years. This is her main income source. She is asking for a micro-loan to diversify the products she sells and to stock up regularly, so as to avoid inventory shortages. For the future, she hopes to save money to meet the needs of her children.

loans.use: to purchase clothing

loans.name: Sokreoun's Group

texts.en:
Sokreoun’s Group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. She earns a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family.

In the group's village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these group members to not only safeguard the health of their families but also save money otherwise spent on medical expenses and time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Sreynang's Group

texts.en: Sreynang’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sreynang does work as a seller and she also does extra work as a factory laborer and construction worker to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Anavel

texts.en: Anavel is a mother of two teenagers from Ormoc City, Leyte. She supports them by engaging in a Sari-sari (general) store business and by selling nipa shingles. Anavel meets challenges along the way when she runs out of stocks and her customers take her goods on credits. She needs additional capital to buy stocks of powdered detergent, coffee, matches, canned corned beef, beef loaf, sardines, creamers, shampoo and supply of nipa shingles to increase her revenue. Anavel is determined to make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy powdered detergent, coffee, matches,  canned corned beef, beef loaf, sardines, creamer, shampoo and supply of nipa shingles

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Gemma is 42 years old and has two children still in school.

Gemma has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 4,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Gemma has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Perjolen

texts.en:
Perjolen is 53 years old and has four children.  Perjolen is married and has one child who is in school. She is in the agricultural business pig fattening in the Philippines. Perjolen requested a 27,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feeds.

Perjolen has been pig fattening for 15 years now, and has borrowed 35 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feeds

loans.name: Sokun's Group

texts.en:
Sokun’s Group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sokun works as a factory laborer, and she also does extra work as a driver to support her family.

In the group's village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these members to not only safeguard the health of their families but also save money otherwise spent on medical expenses and time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru: Мархабо хорошая общительная девушка в возрасте 30 лет, не замужем. Она живет вместе со своей  мамой. К несчастью давним  давно,  когда  ещё она была маленькой её отец умер и вместе с мамой она осталась одна. Не смотря на   то,  что в то время ей маме была очень тяжело, она смогла вырастить такую прекрасную девочку. Её мама была швеёй и этим зарабатывала на жизнь. Маленькая Мархабо всегда помогала маме во всем ,она всегда поддерживала её, поэтому научившись шить у мамы  она решила быть швеёй. Сейчас она хорошо устроилась. У неё есть свой маленький швейный цех ,она известная швея в городе . С помощью мамы она достигла всего этого. Сейчас она хочет купить ещё одну швейную машину и на это ей понадобились деньги. Поэтому она обратилась в  Арванд за кредитом, заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку!!!
texts.en: Marhabo is a good, sociable, 30-year-old young woman. She is not married and lives with her mother. Unfortunately, a long time ago, when she was little, her father passed away, and she was left alone with her mother. Despite the fact that things were very hard for her mother, she was able to raise such a beautiful daughter. Marhabo's mother was a seamstress and earned a living with this trade. Little Marhabo always helped her mother with everything, supported her and, after learning how to sew from her mother, decided to become a seamstress too. Now she is well established. She has a small sewing factory, and she is a famed seamstress in her town. She achieved it all with the help of her mother. Marhabo currently wants to purchase another sewing machine and needs money to do so. This is why she requested a loan from Arvand and thanks Arvand for the support in advance!!!

loans.use: to purchase another sewing machine

loans.name: Savan's Group

texts.en:
Savan’s Group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Savan does work as a factory laborer to support her family.

In the group's village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to not only safeguard the health of their families but also save money otherwise spent on medical expenses and time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Liliosa

texts.en:
Liliosa is 63 years old and is married with 2 children.

Liliosa is in the agriculture business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Liliosa has been practicing pig fattening for 19 years now, and she has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Liliosa would like to build and expand her business so she can secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Zoir

texts.ru: Зоир добродушный и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 33 лет. Он женат, но к сожалению пока не имеет детей. Поэтому всю свою душу он вкладывает в свою работу. Зоир живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он занимается своим бизнесом. Зоир занимается деканством и животноводством. У него имеется земельная площадь. Из общей площади земли, некоторая часть земли составляет богарные земли, а остальная площадь это поливные земли. На этой земле Зоир занимается выращиванием моркови, картошки и зерновых культур. А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот. Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Зоир хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Зоир заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Zoir is a kindhearted and happy 33-year-old man. He is married, but unfortunately does not yet have children.  This is why he pours his soul into this work. Zoir lives with his wife in a small house in a village. He has his own business to support his family. He is involved in farming and animal husbandry. He has land, some of which is rainfed and some irrigated land. Zoir grows carrots, potatoes and cereal crops on this land. His wife helps him to take care of and raise livestock. Because their land plot is large, they also use for pasture for livestock. The animal husbandry business yields a good income, and this is why Zoir wants to expand it by increasing his livestock headcount. Therefore, he came to Arvand to obtain a loan in order to buy livestock. Zoir thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to expand his business

loans.name: Jose Norvil

texts.es:
José Norvil con 41 años de edad,vive en casa propia, junto a sus hijos y su madre, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. José Norvil con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

José Norvil se dedica a la actividad de servicio de transporte público en mototaxi,cuenta con 02 mototaxis, con una experiencia desde hace más de 06 años. Solicita préstamo para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi. De esta manera obtener más ingresos, hacer crecer su negocio y poder mejorar su calidad de vida de él y la de su familia.

José Norvil es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Ha manejado 04 préstamos, el último fué de S/.3,000.00 y lo canceló de forma puntual.
texts.en:
41-year-old José Norvil lives in a house he owns, along with his children and his mother. They live in the Cayaltí district of the Chiclayo province, in Peru's Lambayeque department.

José Norvil has very good personal and professional references from the area's inhabitants. The residents of the region work mostly in farming, sales, and ranching.

José Norvil makes a living through a public transportation business by mototaxi. He has 2 mototaxis and more than 6 years of experience.

He is requesting a loan for maintenance of his mototaxi. In this way, he can earn more income, make his business grow, and be able to improve his and his family's quality of life.

José Norvil is a regular client of Edpyme Alternative. He has taken out 4 loans. The most recent one was for 3,000 nuevos soles, and he repaid it on time.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of his mototaxi

loans.name: Britaldo

texts.es:
Britaldo con 61 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia,junto a su cónyuge, en el distrito de Querecotillo,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú, en una zona rural. Britaldo cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Britaldo se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, con una experiencia en esta actividad desde hace 15 años. Solicita préstamo para invertir en labores de mantenimiento de su cultivo de café, para la compra de abonos, invertir en labores de mantenimiento de su cultivo etc, esto le ayudará a obtener mejores rendimientos en su cosecha, mayores ingresos económicos, y así mejorará su chacra y su calidad de vida.

Britaldo es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Britaldo, 61 years old, lives with his partner in his own house in a rural area of the Querecotillo district, Cutervo province, in the Cajamarca region of Peru. Britaldo has very good references in the area, both personal and professional. The inhabitants of this location mainly work in agriculture, commerce, and ranching.

Britaldo works in agriculture, specifically in growing coffee. He has been working in this trade for 15 years. He is applying for a loan to pay for maintenance on his coffee crop and to buy fertilizer. This will help him to get a higher yield from his crop, earn a higher income, and thus improve his home and his quality of life.





Britaldo es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance work on his coffee crop and to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Chern's Group

texts.en:
Chern’s Group lives in a rural village in Kandal province, in Cambodia.

Chern works as a factory laborer and he also does extra work as a driver to support his family.

In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean, drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these group members to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Ada Maria

texts.es:
El señora. Ada  tiene 53 años de edad, es madre soltera, convive con sus cuatro  hijos, tiene casa propia, vive en  trojes, al oriente de Honduras, es muy conocida en su comunidad  por su dedicacion al trabajo, Su actividad principal es ganaderia actividad con la que cuenta con años de experiencia,  obtiene ingresos a diario de la venta de leche y con estos ingresos  cubre sus gastos familiares y asi tambien compromisos financieros,

La señora Ada con el crédito que nos ha solicitado  tiene como proyecto la compra 2 vacas lechera,  para obtener mas leche para la venta y  mejorar sus ingresos,esta muy contenta por el apoyo que Prisma le puede brindar

 Su sueño es poder aumentar el numero de animales en su hacienda y asi mismo poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida de ella y sus hijos.

Trojes, Honduras, Octubre 2015.
texts.en:
Sra. Ada is 53 years old and a single mother who lives with her four children in her own home. She lives in Trojes in eastern Honduras. She is well-known in her community for her dedication to her work. Her main activity is ranching, in which she has years of experience. She earns her daily income by selling milk, and with this income, she is able to cover her household expenses and financial obligations.

Sre. Ada intends to use this loan to buy two dairy cows so that she can obtain more milk to sell and thus improve her income. She is very grateful for the support that Prisma is able to provide.

Her dream is to be able to increase the number of animals on her farm and, in this way, improve living conditions for herself and for her children.




Trojes, Honduras, Octubre 2015.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Lilita

texts.en:
Lilita is 65 years old, a widow from Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She runs a sari-sari store and a copra production business that are her primary sources of income. She's doing well on her businesses that are supported by her loans from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC).

Recently, Lilita availed herself of a loan to buy wood, plywood, sticks, and nails, and pay labor costs for house repairs. She wants to renovate her house, so that she can live comfortably in her newly renovated home.

loans.use: to buy wood, plywood, sticks, and nails and pay labor costs for house repairs.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Kuña Guapa está en el 1º ciclo, es un grupo nuevo, donde todas tienen la esperanza de poder crecer y mejorar, ellas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, esforzándose por crecer y salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Estanislada, ella tiene una despensa, además tiene productos de confitería de elaboración propia que vende en la comunidad, ella es una persona muy trabajadora, que lucha y se esfuerza para poder crecer cada día. Ella por medio de su sacrificio tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder mejorar el local de su despensa, haciendo arreglos y pintando, ya que por medio de su negocio da a su familia lo que necesitan para una vida digna.
texts.en:
The Kuña Guapa group is in its first loan cycle. It is a new group in which everyone has the hope of being able to grow and improve. They are within the Elimination of Poverty group, striving to grow and get ahead.

One of the members is Estanislada, who has a store. In addition she has candy products that she makes and sells in the community. She is a very hardworking person, who fights and strives to be able to grow each day. Through her sacrifice she has the means to be able to help her family. She seeks this loan to be able to improve the locale of her store, by making repairs and painting, since through her business she provides for her family what they need to live a life with dignity.

loans.use: to improve the locale of her store with painting and various repairs.

loans.name: Clara De Los Angeles

texts.es: Clara de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos desde hace mas de un año comercializa los pollos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa y es gracias a esas ventas es como ella y su familia pueden salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un  credito para la compra de pollos y concentrado para poder seguir adelante con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Clara is 31 years old and lives in her own house with her family. For more than a year, she has been working in raising and selling chickens. She sells them in the various markets close to her house. Thanks to these sales, she and her family are able to move forward.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of chickens and concentrated feed in order to continue moving forward with her work and thus earn better income.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Las Palomitas Group

texts.es: Maria tiene 44 años de edad es conviviente con dos hijos dependiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de buzos para niños y adultos a través de pedidos. Hace 4 años inicio dicha actividad por motivación de su hermana. En sus tiempos libres prepara menús a pedido de sus clientes. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más buzos para niños y adultos ya que tienes pedidos por atender. El grupo “LAS PALOMITAS” agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Maria es la cuarta persona del lado derecho viste buzo rojo y chompa negra.
texts.en:
María is 44 years old, she lives with her partner, and she has two independent children. She sells track suits on order for children and adults, work that she began at the urging of her sister. In her free time she prepares menus on order for her customers.

She will invest the loan in the purchase of more track suits for children and adults, as she has orders to fill. The "Las Palomitas" Group thanks the Kiva lenders for the loan. María is the fourth person on the right, wearing the red track suit and the black sweater.

loans.use: to purchase track suits for children and adults.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco con 48 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,vive junto a su cónyuge y sus 4 hijos, en el distrito de Callayuc,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú.Francisco cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Francisco se dedica a la destilación de aguardiente, una bebida tradicional de la sierra norte del Perú, se procesa a base del jugo de caña de azúcar de manera artesanal mediante una herramienta llamada trapiche, que con la ayuda de dos toros dan vueltas a esta herramienta que extrae el jugo de la caña, para posteriormente hervirlo y purificarlo, con una experiencia en el rubro desde más de 20 años. Solicita préstamo para la compra de materiales para incrementar sus equipos de destilación. De esta manera incrementará los rendimientos de caña y así incrementar las botijas de aguardiente de forma semanal que este vende, así mismo incrementar sus ganancias.

Francisco es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. ha manejado créditos anteriormente el cuál los canceló puntual.
texts.en:
Francisco is 48 years old, is in a civil union, and lives with his partner and 4 children. They live in the Callayuc district, in the Cutervo province, in the department of Cajamarca in Perú. Francisco has very good personal and professional references from the people in his area. The people of this locality work mainly in agriculture, sales, and livestock farming.

Francisco works distilling aguardiente, a traditional drink in the northern highlands of Perú. It is made with sugar cane juice using a traditional method with a tool called a trapiche (press). With the help of two bulls turning the tool, the juice of the cane is extracted, to later boil and purify. He has more than 20 years experience in this field.

He is requesting a loan to purchase materials to improve his distilling equipment. In this way he will increase the yield of the sugar cane and so increase the barrels of aguardiente he sells weekly, which will increase his earnings.

Francisco is a returning member of Edpyme Alternativa. He has previously managed loans which he payed on time.

loans.use: para la compra de materiales para incrementar sus equipos de destilación.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es:
Mariana con 23 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive en casa propia, junto a su cónyuge e hijos, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú.Mariana cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Mariana se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas,caballeros y niños, con una experiencia de más de 05 años en el rubro.Solicita préstamo para invertir en la compra de más mercadería como blusas,pantalones,polos,camisas,etc,de esta manera satisfacer las diversos gustos de sus clientes y esto a le vez le generará mayores ingresos a su unidad familiar.

Mariana no cuenta con experiencia crediticia.
texts.en:
Mariana is 23 years old and is in a common-law relationship. She lives in her own house together with her spouse and children in the district of Cayaltí, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque department, Perú. Mariana has good references both personal and for work from the inhabitants of the area. The people of this district work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Mariana works selling clothing for women, men and children. She has more than five years experience in this field. She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of more merchandise, such as blouses, pants, polo shirts, etc. to satisfy her clients and thus generate more income for her family unit.

Mariana has no credit experience.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of more merchandise like blouses, pants, shirts, t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Yesenia Noemy

texts.es:
Yessenia, de 36 años de edad, es empleada, estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltera, tiene 2 hijos, uno de 16 años y el otro de 13 años y ambos estudian y viven con ella.

Yessenia, trabaja haciendo tostadas, pasteles y otros típicos desde hace 20 años, trabajo que lo aprendió para obtener ingresos para ayudar a sacar adelante a sus hijos y para vender los típicos. 

Yessenia, necesita el préstamo para comprar una novilla para repasto, para así poder aumentar sus ingresos familiares. 

Su sueño a futuro es poder ampliar su casa para que sus hijos crezcan en un buen lugar grande y aseado.
texts.en:
Yessenia is 36 years old, is employed, and finished high school. She is single and has two children, one who is 16 and one who is 13. Both of her children are in school and live with her.

Yessenia works making tostadas [fried plantains], pasteles [fried corn tortillas filled with meat] and other traditional foods and has been doing so for 20 years. She learned this trade in order to earn an income to help her children get ahead and to sell traditional dishes.

Yessenia needs a loan to purchase a heifer for grazing in order to be able to increase her family income. Her dream for the future is to be able to expand her home so that her children can grow up in a good place that is big and clean.

loans.use: to buy a heifer for grazing.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Kuña Guapa está en su primer ciclo  del programa de comités, donde todas trabajan y están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, como un medio de conocer la realidad de cada una y ayudar a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ana ella  es cliente de la Fundación  y tiene cría de animales (pollos, cerdos, y venta de huevos y queso) que vende en la comunidad y en ferias,  tiene  también un kiosco y preparar alimentos con los productos que ella produce (milanesa de pollo, empanadas) para aumentar sus ingresos, es una mujer muy trabajadora, trabaja haciendo todo tipo de cosas, y por medio de ello tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar animales para la cría, como ser cerdos, gallinas y otros, y de esa manera poder tener los medios para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The "Kuña Guapa" group is in its first loan cycle of the group program. They all work, and they are doing the poverty elimination survey, as a way to recognize the true situation of each member and help their families.

Ana is one of the members. She is a client of the Foundation and has a business raising animals (chickens, pigs, and egg and cheese sales) that she sells in the community and at fairs. She also has a kiosk where she makes food with the products she produces (chicken milanese, empanadas) in order to supplement her income. She is a very hard-working woman. She works doing all kinds of things, so that she can have the means to help her family.

She is requesting this loan to buy animals to raise, such as pigs, chickens, and others. This way she can have the means to continue her sales as she has been.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise and sell, such as pigs, chickens, and others

loans.name: Severina

texts.en: Severina is 85 years old and a widow from Poblacion II, Oroquieta City. She is a pensioner member of Paglaum MPC and has requested various loan products including insurance services. Recently, she requested a loan to pay for medical treatment.

loans.use: to pay for medical treatment

loans.name: Godofredo

texts.en:
Godofredo works hard to support his family. He is single and has a business farming rice in the Philippines. He requested a PHP 15,000 loan through GDMPC to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.
Godofredo has been in this business for three years now. He successfully paid back his previous loan, and now he has requested an additional loan to further build his business. In the future, Godofredo would like to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en: Felicitas is 63 years old and a widow from Migcanaway, Tangub City. She busies herself on her farm that gives seasonal income. On weekdays, she is a fish vendor at their local market. She's making good sales from this business where she was able to peddle for the needs of her family. Recently, she requested a loan to buy additional fish to resell.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to resell.

loans.name: Ainun

texts.en:
Mrs. Ainun lives in Wonoayu, Sidoarjo Regency on Java Island in Indonesia, one of the most populous places in the world. In Indonesia, like in many other developing nations, you need to treat water before you can drink it. Unsurprisingly, most Indonesians boil the water before they drink it. Some people also buy water from refill stations, which is not always safe. Mrs. Ainun attended a meeting by Nazava's sales team about alternative household water-treatment options. There she learned about Nazava Water Filters. Nazava Water Filters filter well, rain, and city water so it becomes safe to drink without boiling, without using fuel or electricity.

Mrs. Ainun, who fulfills a leading function in her neighborhood, seized the opportunity and became the sales representative of Nazava in her area. This is the first time Mrs. Ainun has applied for a loan. She has an excellent record in repaying her loans. This loan will allow Mrs. Ainun to buy 10 filters and sell them on consignment to her community, making safe drinking water available to 50 people.

loans.use: to obtain 10 water purifiers to sell to her community members, providing them with safe drinking water.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Joy is 35 years old and has three children who are in school.

Joy has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines. Joy requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell.

Joy has been in this business for five years. In the future, Joy would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Lani

texts.en:
Lani is 45 years old and married with four children. Lani works very hard to provide for them.

Lani runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Lani has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, canned good and other groceries. 

In the future Lani would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.en:
Segundo is 48 years old, married and has four children. He lives in Tambogrande, Piura, Perú, and grows organic mangoes. He feels that organic production is the future and dreams of growing the best organic mangoes ever.

Segundo needs US$ 1,700 as a loan for fertilizing his fields and increasing his organic mango production. With the increased income, he will send his children to university.

loans.use: for fertilizing his fields and increasing his organic mango production.

loans.name: Alcida

texts.es:
La señora Álcida de 45 años de edad es casada vive con su esposo en Nacaome al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace varios años al negocio que es Sastrería y venta de ropa nueva, sus clientes son las personas de su comunidad  es una mujer muy luchadora con muchos deseos de salir adelante.
 La señora Álcida está solicitando el crédito para la compra de ropa nueva como blusas, camisas, pantalones, sandalia, etc. con el apoyo del crédito pretende surtir y mejorar su negocio, está muy alegre de la oportunidad que Prisma le puede brindar.  
Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y poder mejorar su  calidad vida.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre 2015.
texts.en:
Álcida, age 45, is married and lives with her husband in Nacaomel in southern Honduras. For several years she has had a tailoring business, and she sells new clothes. Her customers are people from her community. She is a very tenacious woman with a great desire to get ahead.

Álcida is requesitng a loan to buy new clothes like blouses, shirts, pants, and sandals, etc. With the help of the loan she plans to stock and improve her business. She is very happy about the opportunity that Prisma is able to offer her.

Her dream is for her business to grow and to be able to improve her quality of life.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octuber, 2015.

loans.use: to buy new clothes like blouses, shirts, pants, and sandals.

loans.name: Rahoma

texts.en: Rahoma is 41 years old, married, and has three children. She lives in Gotocan, Ozamiz city, Misamis Occidental with her family. Her husband does a transport business. She owns a little farmland, coconut trees, and corn fields and is doing well. This enables her to earn a good income for the family's needs. She has successfully repaid her previous loan which was used for fertilization of her farm. With her investment, she was able to generate more income than before and support her children's education. She took a new loan recently to pay the labor cost to have her coconut fruits harvested. She wants to improve her farm, and her future plan is to renovate her home for a safe living for the family.

loans.use: to pay the labor cost to have her coconut fruits harvested.

location.town: Gotocan Daku, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.en:
Vanessa is a hardworking female entrepreneur with three children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, milk, soap, shampoo, etc.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Vanessa dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, milk, soap, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Mira

texts.en:
Rosa Mira is 42 years old and has six children. Rosa Mira is married and has four children who are currently in school.

Rosa Mira is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Rosa Mira requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosa Mira has been in pig fattening for thee years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosa Mira would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Merza

texts.en: Merza is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children. She has a pottery in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy raw materials for her pottery business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Merza dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her pottery business.

loans.name: Joselyn

texts.en:
Joselyn works hard to support her family. Joselyn is married and has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines.

Joselyn requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell to her customers.

Joselyn has been in this business for six years now.

In the future, Joselyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell to her customers

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es: Ana María es una mujer de 60 años de edad, madre de tres hijos mayores de edad y reside en compañía de su cónyuge en un barrio ubicado al sur occidente de Barranquilla y desde la comodidad de su vivienda emprendió su propio negocio motivada por una hija quien le sugirió que el sector demandaba de servició de minutos y recargas a todos los operadores a celular y que alternamente podía comercializar golosinas, mecatos y postres a todos aquellos clientes se acercaran a su terraza.  Esta valerosa mujer aceptó con mucho compromiso la sugerencia de su hija y desde el año 2013, accedió a planes de telefonía celular y paquetes de recargas, obteniendo muy buenos resultados con los que ha ayudado a la economía de su hogar.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en recargas, mecatos e ingredientes para elaborar postres; harina, leche condensada, crema de leche, galletas, gelatina sin sabor, mermeladas  y frutas. El sueño de Ana María es realizarle adecuaciones a su vivienda y en su negocio continuar con mucha más variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Ana María, age 60, has three grown children. She lives with her husband in a neighborhood that is southwest of Barranquilla. She undertook her own business from the comfort of her home. She was motivated by a daughter who suggested to her that there was demand in the area for the service of cell phone minutes from all cell phone users. She would also be able to sell sweets, pastries, and desserts to all of the customers who come to her patio.

This courageous woman accepted her daughter's suggestion with great committment. Ever since the year 2013, she got access to cell phone plans and recharge packages. She has been getting very good results with which she has helped with the household finances.

She is currently applying for her first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the loan to buy cell phone cards, pastries, and ingredients like flour, condensed milk. cream, cookies, unflavored gelatin, marmelades, and fruits to make desserts.

Ana María's dream is to make improvements to her house and for her business to continue with a much greater variety of products.

loans.use: to buy prepaid phone cards, pastries, and ingredients like flour, condensed milk, cream, cookies, unflavored gelatin, marmelades and fruits to make desserts.

loans.name: Adrian Asuncion

texts.es:
El señor Adrian tiene más de 40 años vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos se dedica la reparación y venta de llanta, desde hace 7  años   actividad  que  realiza  en su casa de habitación, sus principales clientes son personas que se trasladan de Honduras a Nicaragua y viceversa, tiene muchos clientes ya que su negocio se encuentra en un punto muy estratégico en la orilla de la calle.
El señor Adrian  está solicitando el crédito para la compra de llantas, neumáticos, mechas, pegamento, etc. y así  surtir mas su negocio, ya que día a día tiene mucha demanda de sus cliente, está muy contento del apoyo que prisma le puede bríndala.
Su sueño es tener una de la mejor llantera de la zona y poder darles una mejor vida a su familia.

Choluteca, Honduras –  Octubre  del 2015
texts.en:
Adrian is over 40 years old and lives with his wife and their two children. For the last 7 hears he has worked repairing and selling tires, a job he does from his home. His primary customers are people traveling from Honduras to Nicaragua, and vice versa. He has many customers as his business is located in a very strategic point on the side of the street.

Adrian is seeking a loan to buy tires, tubes, wicks, glue, etc., in order to better supply his business, as every day he has many demands from his customers. He is very content with the support Prisma can provide him. His dream is to have one of the best tire businesses in the area and to be able to provide a better life to his family.

Choluteca, Honduras – October 2015

loans.use: to buy tires, tubes, wicks, glue, etc.

loans.name: Tuilite

texts.en:
Tuilite is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Tuilite is 31 years old and both children are in school.

Tuilite has a rice-retailing business in the Philippines. Tuilite requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

Tuilite has been in this business for two years. In the future, Tuilite would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Vilma works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and she is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Vilma has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Rosalinda works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Rosalinda is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance for her motorcycle transport business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Rosalinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 29 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosemarie is 29 years old and has three children who are still in school.

Rosemarie has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Rosemarie requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish and other materials for her business.

Rosemarie has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Rosa Lina

texts.es:
Rosa, es una mujer casada, vive con su esposo, no tienen hijos ni parientes que les apoyen económicamente; su fuente de ingresos es la venta de ropa, oficio que aprendió gracias a sus padres, cuando ellos murieron ella continuo con el negocio y es así como ella ha salido adelante.
Solicita el crédito porque quiere comprar ropa de moda para abastecer su negocio y atraer a nuevos clientes, a pesar de que cuenta ya con 5 años de tener el negocio es primera vez que ella solicita un crédito, lo que ella pretende es mantener el negocio y volverlo más competitivo, espera recuperar la inversión con para disminuir sus deudas.
El sueño de ella es crear una buena base económica, para que el día que tenga sus hijos pueda darle una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is a married woman who lives with her husband. They don't have children or relatives who support them economically. Her source of income is selling clothes, a trade that she learned thanks to her parents. When they died, she continued with the business, which is how she has continued forward.

She is requesting a loan because she wants to buy fashion clothing to stock her business and attract new customers. Although she has been in the business for 5 years, this is the first time that she has requested a loan. She intends to maintain the business and make it more competitive. She expects to make back the investment in order to lessen her debts.

Her dream is to create a good economic base, so that whenever she has children, she will be able to give them a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fashion clothing to stock her store and attract new customers

loans.name: Jose Armando

texts.es:
José, nuevamente solicita un crédito, ya que necesita capital de trabajo para poderlo invertir en el cultivo de maíz, ayote y pepino, comprara abono y herbicidas para el mantenimiento del sembradillo, considera qué así su continuara trabajando.
Él cuenta que el crédito anterior le ayudo para fortalecer más sus cultivos para obtener mejores cosechas y ganancias,  hoy en día él cuenta con mejores  condiciones económicas, su familia se mantiene en una calidad de vida superior, dice que estos son motivos de mucho peso para continuar esforzándose.
texts.en:
José is once again requesting a loan, as he needs working capital in order to be able to invest in the cultivation of corn, squash, and cucumber, and to purchase compost and herbicide for the maintenance of the crops. He believes that in this way he may continue working.

He says that the previous loan helped him to further strengthen his crops in order to obtain better harvests and earnings. Today he has better economic conditions and his family maintains a higher quality of life. He says that these are powerful reasons for continuing to work hard.

loans.use: to invest in the cultivation of corn, squash, and cucumber; and to purchase compost and herbicide for crop maintenance.

loans.name: Mern's Group

texts.en: Mern’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Mern makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as factory laborer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en: Shazia, age 28, is a mother of four children. She owns a tailoring business within the community, which is the only source of income for the family. She needs to purchase a sewing machine and a variety of tailoring material for her business, including threads, needles, etc. This is very important in order for her to continue her work efficiently and professionally. However, due to the lack of money she finds it difficult. Therefore Shazia is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of helping her business. She will purchase the necessary things with the help of the loan amount. Shazia is feeling happy that she will be able to help her husband with the household expenses once again. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to invest in the tailoring business for herself.

loans.name: Pheng's Group

texts.en: Pheng’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Pheng makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as a factory laborer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Pha's Group

texts.en: Pha’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Pha makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a factory laborer and seller to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Najma

texts.en:
Najma is 43, living with her children and husband in the town of Multan, Pakistan. Her husband runs a furniture polishing shop in the local market. She is a housewife and stays at home taking care of the household. All of her children are school going.

Najma's husband is hardworking and honest.He is an expert in the art of furniture polishing and has trained many helpers as well. His work is being admired in the nearby localities. He wants to improve his services and for that he needs to buy the required inventory. Due to insufficient funds, Najma has applied for a loan and hopes that this investment will be worth it, helping them improve their living standards.

loans.use: to invest in her husband's furniture polishing shop	.

loans.name: Yogesh Prasad

texts.en:
Yogesh Prasad is 25 years old, and his parents' most cherished dream has been for him to get a good education and build a successful career. Over the years, they have sacrificed a great deal for Yogesh Prasad to be able to continue studying, and he repaid their faith when he successfully graduated with a degree from a reputed university in Odisha, India. Now, he hopes to find good employment in the banking industry.

Yogesh Prasad has great hopes of a good, stable job in the city, and a life of independence and dignity. But, there is one last bit that remains to be done. To be able to get into a reputed bank, he needs to make some specific additions to his skill-set and has decided to enroll in a banking course. In addition to key financial skills, this course will also expose Yogesh Prasad to aspects of business communication, leadership, experiential learning, and professional skill development. With this course supplementing his degree, he is certain to find excellent employment opportunities.

Therefore, he is requesting a loan amount of 70,000 INR from Kiva's partner People's Forum. He will use the loan amount to pay his banking course fees and complete his course with flying colors and gain name and fame in this industry.

Yogesh Prasad is eagerly awaiting your kind help, so that he can complete his course smoothly.

loans.use: to pay his banking course fees.

loans.name: Eden

texts.en:
Eden is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a motorcycle operator business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle operator business.

Eden has been in this business for 10 years. Eden earns more income from farming rice.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth works hard to support herself. She is single and has a general store business in the Philippines. Elizabeth requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell. She has been in this business for two years. In the future, Elizabeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en: Nancy is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She supplements this income with earnings from her food vending. Nancy dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is 55 years old and married with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Victoria has a general store business in the Philippines. Victoria requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell.

Victoria has been in this business for three years. In the future, Victoria would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Elizabeth works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, She also earns additional income from making dried fish. Elizabeth is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Elizabeth has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 59 years old and married with seven children, two of whom are still in school. Jocelyn works very hard to provide for them. Jocelyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, bread, shampoo, snack foods, drinks, etc.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, bread, shampoo, snack foods, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Leonora works hard to support her family.

She has a business making dried fish in the Philippines, She also earns additional income from dried fish. Leonora is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fish to make dried fish for her dried-fish-making business.

Leonora has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Maria Lucia

texts.es:
María, es una mujer que vive con su compañero de vida y tiene una hija, la cual depende ella económicamente de ellos, María se dedica a la venta de mariscos desde hace siete años y es empleada de un merendero, donde ya tiene año y medio de laborar ahí, mientras ella trabaja es su madre quien le atiende el negocio.
María solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de camarón, pescado y moluscos, de esa manera ella venderá más y atenderá las demandas de sus clientes, además sus ganancias aumentaran,  el resto lo utilizara para hacerle mejoras a su vivienda, pues así podrá darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Ella tiene muchos sueños pero el principal es poder ampliar su negocio y ayudar a su familia tener menos necesidades en su hogar.
texts.en:
María lives with her life partner and they have a daughter who depends on them financially. María has been selling seafood for 7 years. She has also been employed at an outdoor restaurant for a year and a half. While she works, her mother runs the business.

María is requesting a loan to buy shrimp, fish, and mollusks. This way, she will sell more and meet her customers’ demand. In addition, her earnings will increase. The remainder of the loan will be used to make improvements to her house so she can give her family a better quality of life.

María has many dreams, but the main ones are to expand her business and to help her family have fewer needs at home.

loans.use: to buy shrimp, fish, and mollusks so she can sell more and meet her customers’ demand.

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
Maribeth is 40 years old and married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Maribeth has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Maribeth requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

Maribeth has been in this business for 14 years. Maribeth would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Rona Mae

texts.en:
Rona Mae is 34 years old and married with two children.  With both children in school, Rona Mae works very hard to provide for them.

Rona Mae runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Rona Mae has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, canned good, personal care products and other groceries. 

In the future Rona Mae would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.en:
Lorenza is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net, bamboo, etc. for her fishing business.

Lorenza has been in this business for 10 years. Lorenza earns more income from dried fish vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net, bamboo, etc

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a 49-year-old married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Evelyn has a fishing business in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy fish net, bamboo, and gasoline for her boat and maintenance for her business.

Evelyn has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish net, bamboo, and gasoline for her boat and maintenance for her business.

loans.name: Kaem's Group

texts.en: Kaem’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Kaem makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as factory laborer and seller to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Alokhon

texts.en:
Alokhon was born in 1994 year. He is single and lives with parents. He studies at the Pedagogical University of Penjikent. Alokhon is learning Mandarin Chinese. He is a student of the 2nd course. Alokhon studies well and he wants to be a good translator or teacher in the future.

His parents are farmers and they have no money to pay for his university tuition. Alokhon is asking for a loan of 4000 Somoni to pay for the university tuition. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition for a BA in Mandarin Chinese.  His parents are farmers and do not have funds to support him.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is a married woman, 66 years old with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Corazon has a food vending business in the Philippines. Corazon requested a PHP 7000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, spices, cooking oil, bamboo sticks and other materials for her food production business.

Corazon has been in this business for 4 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, spices, cooking oil, bamboo sticks and other materials for her food production business

loans.name: Adebys Del Carmen

texts.es: Adebys es una mujer emprendedora que con sus confecciones ha logrado conseguir el sustento para su familia, ella es madre una hija menor de edad y en su condición de madre soltera ha tenido que asumir las riendas de su hogar al no contar con el apoyo de su cónyuge. Ella considera que tiene en sus genes este arte el que empíricamente desarrolla y entrega lo mejor de su talento con el ánimo de satisfacer a los residentes de un barrio de Cartagena de Indias quienes son sus principales clientes, sin embargo sus confecciones son muy conocidas en otros sectores del municipio gracias a los referenciados de sus propios clientes. En la actualidad Adebys está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en una máquina de coser de nuevas tecnologías que le permita manejar un mejor acabado en las prendas.  Su meta a futuro es iniciar un taller y tener multiplex máquinas de coser disponibles para contratar personal y contar con excelentes contratos.
texts.en:
Adebys is an entrepreneurial woman who has managed to get support for her family with her dressmaking. She is a mother of a young daughter and in her condition as a single mother she has had to assume control of her home by not relying on support from her partner.

She considers this art, which she develops empirically, to be in her genes. She hands over the best of her talent with the intention of satisfying the residents of a neighborhood in Cartagena de Indias, who are her primary clients. Nevertheless, her dressmaking is well known in other areas of the town, thanks to references from her own clients.

Adebys is currently applying for a Kiva loan, with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo conducting primary financing, in order to invest in a sewing machine with new technology that allows her to manage a better finish on the garments. Her goal for the future is to start a studio and to have multiple sewing machines available in order to hire staff and have excellent contracts.

loans.use: to invest in a sewing machine.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es: Gloria es una emprendedora mujer que reside en una urbanización en Cartagena de Indias y que encontró una oportunidad de negocio entre su comunidad; los habitantes de este sector debían de caminar trayectos muy extensos en medio del sofocante sol y calor de esta ciudad, es por ello que Gloria decidió ocupar la capacidad de su refrigerador con bebidas gaseosas, jugos naturales, agua y algunos mecatos, para satisfacer esta necesidad.  Gloria cuenta con dos años en este negocio con el que logra sustentar a su único hijo al ser madre soltera y desea mantenerlo siempre surtido para evitar perder ventas.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar gaseosas y jugos al por mayor y surtido de mecatos y dulces.  Su meta a futuro es engrandecer su negocio y adquirir casa propia.
texts.en:
Gloria is an enterprising woman who lives in a neighborhood in Cartagena de Indias. She found a business opportunity in her community: area residents had to walk very long distances under the blazing hot sun of the city. That is why Gloria decided to stock her refrigerator with soft drinks, natural juices, water, and some pastries to satisfy that need. Gloria has been in this business for two years, and as a single mother, this is how she supports her son. She wants to keep stocked at all times in order to avoid losing sales.

Gloria is applying for a Kiva loan, her first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, in order to buy soft drinks and juices at wholesale and a selection of pastries and sweets. Her future goal is to expand her business and acquire her own house.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and juices at wholesale and a selection of pastries and sweets.

loans.name: Florette

texts.fr: Florette, 35 ans, vit en union libre. Elle est mère de 2 enfants qui sont scolarisés. Pour apporter son appui financier dans son foyer, elle a entrepris  une activité commerciale à domicile. Elle revend des produits alimentaires et œuvre sans relâche pour développer son commerce. Elle demande un prêt pour augmenter son stock. Son rêve est de devenir autonome financièrement et pouvoir donner de bonnes conditions de vie à ses enfants.
texts.en: Florette, 35 years old, lives with her partner. She is the mother of two children who go to school. To bring her support to finance her house, she undertook a business activity in her home. She resells food products and works tirelessly to develop her business. She asks for this loan to increase her stock. Her dream is to become financially independent and to be able to give good living conditions to her children.

loans.use: to buy some cases of spaghetti and rice.

loans.name: Vertulie

texts.fr: Vertulie a 40 ans. Elle est mariée et a trois enfants à sa charge. Son mari est agriculteur. Pour subvenir aux dépenses de la famille, Vertulie a entrepris une petite activité de revente de produits alimentaires au marché communal de la ville. Elle fait face souvent à des ruptures de stock. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter ses stocks afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients.
texts.en: Vertulie is 40 years old. She is married and has three children for whom she is responsible. Her husband is a farmer. To provide for the expenses of the family, Vertuile began a small business of reselling food products at the local city market. She often faces stock shortages. She asks for this microloan to increase her stock in order to better respond to the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy bags of sugar and flour.

loans.name: Viviane

texts.fr: Viviane, 38 ans, est mariée mais  n’a pas d’enfants. Elle revend des produits alimentaires. Elle travaille très dur pour assurer la croissance de son commerce. Pour commencer, elle n’avait pas beaucoup de moyens, mais elle s’est débrouillée avec le peu qu’elle avait pour démarrer l’activité. Aujourd’hui, grâce au microcrédit, elle arrive à augmenter ses stocks et être toujours en mesure de satisfaire les besoins de ses clients. Le crédit lui permet d’éviter des ruptures de stock.
texts.en: Viviane, 38 years old, is married but does not have any children. She resells food products. She works very hard to insure the growth of her business. In order to begin, she didn't have a lot of resources, but she managed to start her business with the little that she had. Today, thanks to microloans, she is able to increase her stock and always be able to fulfill the needs of her customers. The loan allows her to avoid stock shortages.

loans.use: to buy cases of chips and spaghetti.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
La señora Susana  de 48  años  de edad, vive con su esposo y tiene 03  hijos que dependen de ambos, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo,  al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 11  años  a la venta de queso y cuajada.
Doña Susana  sus clientes principales son pulpería y a las personas que tiene comedores,  también se dedica a la elaboración de baleadas, tiene dos personas que le ayudan en el proceso de la elaboración de los quesos.
 Doña  Susana es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que lucha día con día para salir adelante esta solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de refrescos y leche para elaborar la cuajada y quesos,  con el apoyo de este préstamo  pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su condición de vida, está muy contenta  de seguir trabajando con Prisma y su deseo es seguir luchando para darle un mejor futuro a su familia, este es sexto  préstamo que solicita.
 Su sueño es mejorar su casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre del 2015.
texts.en:
Susana is 48 years old and lives with her husband and three dependent children. They live in a community of San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras. They have their own house and she has made a living the past 11 years selling cheese and curds.

Susana's main customers are grocery stores and restaurants. She is also engaged in making baleadas (a traditional Honduran dish). She has 2 people who help in the cheese making process.

Susana is hardworking and enterprising and strives every day to be successful. She is requesting this loan to pay for refreshments and milk for making cheese and curds. With the support from this loan she aims to improve their income and living conditions. She is very happy to continue working with Prisma and has a desire to continue fighting for a better future for her family. This is the 6th loan she has requested.

Her dream is to improve her house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October, 2015.

loans.use: to purchase refreshments and milk for her business.

loans.name: Einstein

texts.es:
Einstein con 21 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,vive en casa propia de material rústico, junto a su cónyuge y de su menor hijo de un año de edad, en el distrito de Pimpingos,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. Einstein cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura cultivo de café, cría-engorde de ganado vacuno, cría de animales menores y cultivo de productos de pan llevar.

Einstein se dedica a la siembra,específicamente al cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 3 hectáreas de variedad Catimor resistente a enfermedades y plagas, plantación esta en segundo y cuarto año de producción, cultivo de café lo realiza en terreno propio ubicado en el CPM Condorhuasi distrito de Pimpingos, actividad la realiza hace 5 años. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría de animales menores (gallinas, cuyes, cerdo) y cultivo de productos de pan llevar (yuca, plátano, vituca) siendo estos tres últimos para su consumo y en ocaciones para la venta,además trabaja como chofer ruta Pimpingos – Cutervo. El destino del crédito será para mantenimiento y cultivo de 1 hectárea de café en producción, de las 3 hectáreas que cuenta y así asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2016, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar calidad de vida de él y de su familia.

Einstein es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.Firma con su cónyuge.
texts.en:
Einstein is 21 years old and in a common law marriage. He lives in a home he owns made of rustic material, together with his partner, and their one year old boy, in the district of Pimpingos, in the province of Cutervo, in the department of Catamarca, in Perú. Einstein has very good personal and work references from the inhabitants of the area. The residents of that area work primary in agriculture, growing coffee, raising and breeding cattle, breeding small animals, and growing staple crops.

Einstein works in farming, specifically growing coffee. He currently has 3 hectares of the Catimor variety, which is resistant to diseases and pests. His plantation is in the second and fourth year of production. He grows coffee on his own land, located in CPM Condorhuasi, in the district of Pimpingos, a job he's worked for 5 years. In addition, he works breeding small animals (chickens, guinea pigs and pigs) and growing staple crops (yucca, banana and taro). The crops are for his own consumption, and occasionally for selling. He also works as a driver on the Pimpingos Cutervo route.

The loan will be used to maintain and plant 1 hectare of coffee in production, of the 3 hectares he has, thus ensuring a good production for the 2016 season, which will be reflected in a greater volume of sales. From this he will obtain increased earnings in order to be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

Einstein is a new member of Edpyme Alternative. He is signing with his partner.

loans.use: to maintain and plant 1 hectare of coffee in production, of the 3 hectares he has, in order to ensure a good production for the 2016 season.

loans.name: Amparo

texts.es:
La señora  Amparo de 50 años de edad, no tiene   hijos,  vive con su esposo en casa  propia, en la comunidad de  San Lorenzo,  al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 4  años  al negocio de la venta de abarrotería como ser: frijoles, arroz, frescos, churros, carnes, pollo, aceite, manteca, papel higiénico, es una mujer trabajadora  con deseos de salir adelante.

La señora Amparo está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de productos básicos como ser arroz, frijoles, huevo, aceité café etc. Con el apoyo del crédito  pretende mejorar  su negocio y a la vez su calidad de vida , es su tercer crédito que solicita a Prisma. 
 
Su sueño es mejorar su casa y tener una mejor vida.

San Lorenzo, honduras- 22 de Octubre del 2015.
texts.en:
Amparo is 50 years old and doesn't have any children. She lives with her husband in their own house located in San Lorenzo, in southern Honduras. For 4 years, she has had a business selling groceries such as beans, soft drinks, churros, beef, chicken, oil, butter, and toilet paper.

Amparo is a hardworking woman with the desire to get ahead. Amparo is requesting a loan to buy commodities such as rice, beans, eggs, oil, coffee, etc. With the help of this loan, she intends to improve her business and also her quality of life. This is her 3rd loan from Prisma. Her dream is to improve her house and have a better life.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 22, 2015.
